apex_test_suite_debug_not_supported_mess: Test suites cannot be debugged. Please debug individual test classes or methods.
apex_testing_discovery_source_descriptio: Select the source for Apex test discovery.

apex_testing_use_test_explorer_descripti: Use the VS Code Test Explorer for Apex tests. When enabled, the new Test Explorer UI will be shown instead of the traditional Apex Test View.
